review: 회사 바이어를 모시고 얼결에 가 보게 된 한국가구박물관. 미리 예약을 하고 시간에 맞추어 방문을했다. 입장료가 살짝 부담스럽게 느껴졌으나 한시간을 넘는 투어를 하고 나니 그 값이 하나도 아깝게 느껴지지 않았다. 한국의 전통가옥들 뿐 아니라 성북동에서 바라보게되는 풍경의 아름다움도 빼어났다. 실내에 전시된 전통가구들은 우리나라에 이리 아름다운 가구들이 많았나싶을만큼 전통적이면서도 현대적인 감각도 느껴지는 뛰어난 작품들이었다. 해설사님의 설명을 같이 들으면서 그동안 몰랐던 우리 조상들의 아름다운
review_en: The Korean Furniture Museum, which I went to with my company buyer. I made a reservation in advance and visited on time. The admission fee seemed a little burdensome, but after an hour-long tour, it was not a waste of money. In addition to traditional Korean houses, the beauty of the scenery seen from Seongbuk-dong is also outstanding. The traditional furniture displayed indoors was so traditional and modern that it seemed that there were so many beautiful furniture in Korea. Listening to the narrator's explanation, we've never known about the beautiful nature of our ancestors.

review: 삭막함을 떠나 편안함을 주며 마음으로 많은 것을 담아갈 수 있는 좋은 곳. 작년 가을에이어 이번엔 여름의 문턱에 왔다 계절마다 느낌이다르고, 답답함과 무더위를 잊게해주는 아름다운 경치와 우리문화의 위대함을 다시 알게해주었다
review_en: A good place to leave the gloom behind, to give comfort and to carry many things with your heart. Last fall, I came to the threshold of summer. It felt like every season. It reminded me of the beautiful scenery and the greatness of our culture.

It takes an hour to get a regular tap. If you are interested in traditional furniture, please visit there. It's a museum that I really recommend.

Having a good time here, you will be able to understand the culture and national spirit of the Korean people more deeply. First of all, you can access the museum's website and see the tranquility you're going to encounter
